name: Shotgun Chicken
description:
Shotgun Chicken is a Foddian Precision Platformer where one wrong move can send you tumbling to the bottom! Your goal is to reach the chicken coop but the journey up will be much more challenging than it seems.

The main mechanic is your trusty old shotgun which you use to propel yourself through the air. Shotgun shell after shotgun shell you inch forward up the massive climb. However one wrong move is enough to make you tumble down the mountain.

Do you have the patience to make it back to the chicken coop or will you give up?

Epilepsy warning: contains bright visuals.
